title: Data Scientist
company: iA Auto Finance/ iA Financement auto
responsibilities: Experience working in data warehousing, data architecture and/or data engineering environments at enterprise scale.

required: Experience working in data warehousing, data architecture and/or data engineering environments at enterprise scale.

title: Data Scientist

soft: Ability to prioritize and manage conflicting demands

responsibilities: Design and develop scalable solutions for analyzing multiple data sets
Create and maintain data pipelines, data structures, ML/AI models, and reports
Ensure data integrity, reproducibility of analysis and support analytical models and reports
Assess and recommend new business development opportunities exposed through data analysis
Automate manual processes and reports to optimize data delivery
Create reports showing key risk indicators for auto finance business
Identify and help implement new / alternative data sources
Use data analytics to find process efficiencies in back office processes
Maintain accurate and complete documentation for all activities
Mentor less experienced members of the team
Communicate and popularize the different aspects of the models

required: Degree in math, computer science, statistics, data science, actuarial science or related field
preferred: Understanding of profit drivers in auto finance

title: Senior Data Analyst
responsibilities: Help maintain quality and consistency of data
Experience reviewing documents and cross-checking data
Identify mismatches, missing data, or duplicates

title: SENIOR DATA ANALYST
location: Toronto, Ontario (hybrid – 2 to 3 days onsite per week)
responsibilities: Review internal records for financial counterparties
Compare against third-party sources and legal docs
Identify mismatches, missing data, or duplicates
Assist with basic reporting
Help maintain quality and consistency of data

required: 3 to 5 years working with financial data (e.g. bonds, securitizations, fixed income)
Experience reviewing documents and cross-checking data
preferred: Basic familiarity with tools like Bloomberg or Refinitiv
